version_description:
Enjoy XB Deals with the biggest update this year:
- Support for iOS 11
- Highly requested Push Notifications Settings - turn on/off any kind of notifications. Go to "Profile"->"Push Notifications Settings".
- Highly requested Sorting in lists - now you can sort games & add-ons in your Watch list, Wish list and Purchases list by date added, title, discount, rating, release date or price.
- Desired Price - set the desired price for game/add-on and receive notifications only when it passes the threshold. Available for Premium Users.
- Auto-renewable Subscriptions - we are changing XB Deals Subscription options to auto-renewable with a newly added 1-Month Subscription. Subscription can be canceled anytime. This applies to newly purchased subscription. Current active subscriptions are not affected by this change and won't auto-renew at the end of the term.
- "New" badge in Discounts tab - to let you know what games and add-ons were discounted in the past 24 hours.
- Video Reviews Titles - much easier to choose what review you'd like to watch next.
- External Links Settings - open video reviews in Youtube native app, websites in Safari. Go to "Profile"->"Links".
- iPad Pro 10.5" grid contains 4 games in a row now
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

This update contains some tweeks, optimizations and bugs fixes.
Also:
- Content type is now “GAMES” by default. If you’d like to change it back, go to Profile -> Default Content Type -> Choose ALL, GAMES or ADD-ONS
- Filters are now available in Collections
Important bug fixes and performance improvements

Full iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max & iPhone XR support.
This update also contains some tweaks, optimizations and bugs fixes.

iOS 14 support.
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available XB Deals features.
This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
